item.title: Arch Linux with btrfs and KDE Plasma
item.description: Video Greetings Arch_Linux_Install_Kde_Plasma_btrfs Hi all, in this video i will show how to install Arch Linux with KDE Plasma and btrfs. KDE is a software project currently comprising a desktop environment known as Plasma, a collection of libraries and frameworks (KDE Frameworks) and several applications (KDE Applications) as well. btrfs is a modern copy on write (CoW) filesystem for Linux. I hope you enjoy! Links Arch Linux - Download btrfs - ArchWiki Timeshift Steps Pre-Install Update the system clock $ timedatectl set-ntp true Partitioning We will create as following partition scheme:

item.title: Full Install bspwm on Ubuntu 21.04
item.description: Video Greetings Links Steps 1. Install git 2. Install bspwm 3. Finish Video Greetings Ubuntu 21.04 Full Install bspwm Environment Hi all, in this video i will show how to Install a full bspwm environment on Ubuntu 21.04. bspwm is a tiling window manager that represents windows as the leaves of a full binary tree. bspwm supports multiple monitors and is configured and controlled through messages.

item.title: How to Install Webmin on Ubuntu 21.04
item.description: Video Greetings Links Steps 1. Update and Upgrade 2. Install Dependencies 3. Install Webmin 4. Finish Video Greetings Hi all, in this video i will show how to Install Webmin on Ubuntu 21.04. Webmin is a web-based interface for system administration for Unix. Using any modern web browser, you can setup user accounts, Apache, DNS, file sharing and much more. Webmin removes the need to manually edit Unix configuration files like /etc/passwd, and lets you manage a system from the console or remotely.

item.title: How to Enable Chaotic-AUR on Arch Linux
item.description: Table of Contents Video Greetings Links Steps 1. Install the Keys 2. Update and Upgrade Finish Video Greetings Hi all, in this video i will show how to enable Chaotic-AUR on Arch Linux. Chaotic-AUR is a unofficial user reposity for Arch Linux that has prebuilt binaries from the AUR. Several apps and custom kernels are available in this repo, and this includes kernels specially tuned for gamer and desktop use.

item.title: Install tkg Gamer Kernel to Speed Booster on Arch Linux
item.description: Table of Contents Video Greetings Links Steps 1. Chaotic-AUR 2. Enable Chaotic-AUR 3. Install TKG Kernel 4. Customize Grub Finish Video Greetings Hi all, in this video i will show how to install TKG Gamer Kernel on Arch Linux. You only need have one system with Arch Linux fully installed. I hope you enjoy! Links Arch Linux Arch Linux Wiki Arch Linux Wiki - Kernel Chaotic-AUR Steps 1.

item.title: Arch Linux Full Install with bspwm
item.description: Hi all, in this video i will show how to full install Arch Linux with bspwm desktop environment. The boot mode will be EFI. I’m assuming you already have the usb stick with the Arch Linux ISO. If you use wireless network, please go to the site in the description and see the link to properly configure your network. I hope you enjoy! Links Download the latest Arch Linux ISO Connect to the Internet - Arch Linux Wiki Yay Arch Linux Wiki - Swap File Duck Channel´s bspwm-install 1.

Webmin is a web-based interface for system administration for Unix. Using any modern web browser, you can setup user accounts, Apache, DNS, file sharing and much more. I hope you enjoy! 1. Enable AUR If you have AUR enabled in your system, please go to the next section.

item.title: Arch Linux Btrfs Kde Plasma Full Install [2021]
item.description: Hi all, in this video i will show how to full install Arch Linux with BTRFS filesystem. The boot mode will be EFI. I’m assuming you already have the usb stick with the Arch Linux ISO. My internet is wired, so if you have wireless network, please go to the website that is in the description of this video and see the link to properly configure your network.

item.title: Arch Linux Dual Boot Windows 10
item.description: Hi all, in this video i will show how to install Arch Linux Dual Boot with Windows 10. The bootloader utilized is Grub and boot mode is uefi. The Arch Linux installation will be only the base system with network and bootloader. I will use virtual machine, but the procedure is the same and it does not affect. I hope you enjoy! Bios Boot the PC and press the manufacturers key to open the BIOS.

item.title: How to Install Arch Linux - 2021
item.description: Commands 1. Set the Keyboard Layout $ loadkeys yourKeyboardLayout The default console keymap is US. Available layouts can be listed with: $ ls /usr/share/kbd/keymaps/**/*.map.gz 2. Config the Best Mirrors $ reflector -c "BR" -f 12 -n 10 -l 12 \ --save /etc/pacman.d/mirrorlist --verbose $ pacman -Syy 3. Partitioning the Disk $ fdisk /dev/yourDevice Create the root partition and the swap. 4. Formatting the partitions use mkfs.ext4, mkswap and mkfs.
